page.title: 04TRANSPORT
page.content: There are a few buses which serve our area,but the bus service is very poor.The buses run on a two hourly service from 9am till 7pm.The bus service is augmented by a post bus service but this only runs once a day.This post bus is really the postal deliveries mini bus and even this is under threat. As a result of the poor bus service many families require to run two cars, one for transport to work and the other for use in shopping. This increases the cost of living in this rural area. The nearest railway station is in Cupar seven miles away. Nearest airport is in Edinburgh which is approximately forty miles distant.
